original: Berntsson, Martin Josua, komminister, Svanesund, f. 19/9/03 i Hålanda, Älvsb. 1. — Stud :ex. i Gbg 25, teol. fil. ex. 27, teol. kand. o. prakt. teol. prov 30, prästv. f. Gbgs stift 31. V. kommin. i Sjötofta 31, v. pastor i Na-verstad s. å., i Myckleby 32, ständig adj. i Ödsmål 33, kommin. i Myckleby sed. 37.
translated: Berntsson, Martin Josua, minister, Svanesund, born on September 19th, 1903 in Hålanda, Älvsborg. He graduated with a degree in theology from Gothenburg University in 1925, completed a theological bachelor's in 1927, passed practical theology exams in 1930, and was ordained in the Gothenburg diocese in 1931. He worked as an assistant pastor in Sjötofta in 1931, a deputy pastor in Navervad in the same year, in Myckleby in 1932, and as a permanent deputy in Ödsmål in 1933. In 1937 he became a minister in Myckleby, and was married that same year.

structured.name: Martin Josua Berntsson

spouse.name: Mentioned but not specified in the original text
